formulas.name: varServiceRequest
formulas.expression: if((NOT(ISNULL({!Time_Zone2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Time_Zone2}))), "Time Zone- " +{!Time_Zone2} + {!newLine} ,null)+IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, "Address 1  -" +{!Address_3}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, "Address 2 (Apt or Unit#) -" +{!Address_2_Apt_or_Unit}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, "City  -" +{!City2}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, "State/Province  -" +{!State_Province1}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, "Zip/Postal Code  -" +{!Zip_Postal_Code1}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, "Country  -" +{!Country1}+ {!newLine}, "") +if((NOT(ISNULL({!Country_Code_Canada.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Country_Code_Canada.value}))), "Country Code- " +{!Country_Code_Canada.value} + {!newLine} ,null)+ IF({!phone3.value}!=NULL, "Personal Cell Phone Number  -" +{!phone3.value}+ {!newLine}, "") +if((NOT(ISNULL({!Personal_Email_Address.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Personal_Email_Address.value}))), "Personal Email Address - " +{!Personal_Email_Address.value} + {!newLine} ,null) +If(NOT(ISNULL({!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName})), "Update_Existing_Direct_Reports-" + {!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName} + {!newLine},null) +If(!ISNULL({!Additional_Information}) && !ISBLANK({!Additional_Information}), 'Additional Information - ' + {!Additional_Information} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Address_1}) && !ISBLANK({!Address_1}), 'Address 1 - ' + {!Address_1} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Address_2}) && !ISBLANK({!Address_2}), 'Address 2 (Apt or Unit#) - ' + {!Address_2} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!City1}) && !ISBLANK({!City1}), 'City- ' + {!City1} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!State_Province}) && !ISBLANK({!State_Province}), 'State/Province- ' + {!State_Province} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Zip_Postal_Code}) && !ISBLANK({!Zip_Postal_Code}), 'Zip/Postal Code- ' + {!Zip_Postal_Code} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Country}) && !ISBLANK({!Country}), 'Country- ' + {!Country} + {!newLine}, Null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Email_forwarding})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Email_forwarding}))), "Email Forwading  -" +{!Email_forwarding} + {!newLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Phone_number_forwarding})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Phone_number_forwarding}))), "Phone number forwarding  -" +{!Phone_number_forwarding} + {!newLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Mailbox_delegation})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Mailbox_delegation}))), "Mailbox delegation  -" +{!Mailbox_delegation} + {!newLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!One_Drive_Access})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!One_Drive_Access}))), "One Drive Access  -" +{!One_Drive_Access} + {!newLine} ,null)
